name: Quick Start
desc: Gain 14 XP.

name: Level Boost
desc: Gain 6 XP now and the start of next stages

name: Endgame
desc: When you reach Level 9, gain 30 gold

name: Double Streak
desc: Gain 2 times the streak amount.(Max 2Gold) (1 avg gold)

name: Safe Savings
desc: Gain 1 gold and 1 gold every round.

name: Lucky Drop
desc: Each kill has a 25% chance to drop gold.

name: Component Crafter
desc: Gain a random item component and component avnil(box offer 3 choices)

name: Early Forge
desc: Receive a random item at the start of each stage.

name: Item Reward
desc: Gain an extra item component every 4 wins.

name: Restricted Storage
desc: For the upcoming stage, your bench is limited to only 1 slot. However, at the start of the next stage, you are rewarded with 3 random completed items.

name: Free Spin
desc: Start of Each Stage gain 3 free rolls

name: Saver's Reroll
desc: Receive a free roll if no purchases were made in the shop during the previous round.

name: Backup Reroll
desc: Gain 2 reroll now and gain 1 reroll after losing a player combat

name: Lucky Pick
desc: Gain a free reroll with a 10% chance after every round.

name: Healthy Boost
desc: Increase your current and max player health by 25.

name: All Tier One
desc: Gain a copy of each Tier One champion.

name: Scorching Strikes
desc: Fire units' basic attacks burn enemies for 3% of the damage dealt over 3 seconds. Abilities cause a small explosion, dealing 5% of the target's max health as area-of-effect (AoE) damage to nearby enemies.

name: Chilling Touch
desc: Water units’ basic attacks slow enemies by 15% for 2 seconds. Abilities have a 20% chance to freeze enemies for 1 second.

name: Thunderous Impact
desc: Storm units’ basic attacks have a 10% chance to stun enemies for 1 second. Abilities cause a small KnockBack, pushing enemies back 1 hex and reducing their Accuracy by 10% for 3 seconds.

name: Radiant Precision
desc: Light units’ basic attacks have a 10% chance to Cure themselves or a nearby ally, removing all debuffs. Abilities restore 3% health to Light units over 3 seconds (Recovery).

name: Poisonous Shadows
desc: Dark units' basic attacks have a 15% chance to poison the target, dealing 3% of their max health as damage over 3 seconds. Abilities have a 20% chance to inflict Nightmare, causing enemies to miss their next basic attack.

name: Chaotic Surge
desc: 1 level in  Accuracy every 10 seconds for 5 seconds.

name: Cinematic Strike
desc: 1 level in Defense every 10 seconds for 5 seconds

name: Nature's Bulwark
desc: 1 level in MP Recovery every 10 seconds for 5 seconds

name: Rageborne Fury
desc: 1 level in Attack Speed every 10 seconds for 5 seconds

name: Iron Resolve
desc: 1 level in Attack  every 10 seconds for 5 seconds

name: Phantom Reflex
desc: 1 level in Critical Damage every 10 seconds for 5 seconds

name: Savage Momentum
desc: 1 level in Physical and Magical Resistance every 10 seconds for 5 seconds

name: Shield of Valor
desc: 1 level in Critical Rate every 10 seconds for 5 seconds

name: Bench Control
desc: If you have all units on your bench or no unit's  at the end of a stage,  gain 2 experience points. (other than Consumables)

name: Rapid Growth
desc: Gain 6XP now. At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 8 XP each round

name: Empty Space
desc: if there are no items on your bench, Gain 2 XP for every round ( start with 1 extra component box )

name: Steady Income
desc: Gain 8 gold now and for next 4 rounds

name: investment++
desc: max interest to 7 and gain 15 golds

name: Treasure Vault
desc: Gain 3 random item components, component box , and 1 Reforger

name: Victory Craft
desc: Earn 2 item components and a component box after every 4 victories

name: Item Randomizer
desc: At the start of each round, all items on your bench are randomized, also gain 2 random component

name: Spin Boost
desc: Start of Each Stage gain 5 free rolls

name: Free Shoping
desc: Gain shop reroll every round

name: Symbol of Chaos
desc: Gain a Chaos Emblem

name: Seal of the Blockbuster
desc: Gain a Blockbuster Emblem

name: Crest of the Verdant
desc: Gain a Druid Emblem

name: Sigil of Wrath
desc: Gain a Fury Emblem

name: Badge of Girl Crush
desc: Gain a Girl Crush Emblem

name: Phantom's Insignia
desc: Gain a Mirage Emblem

name: Talisman of the Untamed
desc: Gain a WildRush Emblem

name: Oathkeeper’s Emblem
desc: Gain a Guardian Emblem

name: Blazing Assault
desc: Fire units' basic attacks burn enemies for 5% of the damage dealt over 4 seconds. Abilities cause a larger explosion, dealing 7% of the target's max health as AoE damage to nearby enemies, and burning them for 2% of their max health over 2 seconds.

name: Frozen Grasp
desc: Water units’ basic attacks slow enemies by 25% for 3 seconds. Abilities have a 30% chance to freeze enemies for 1.5 seconds, and frozen enemies take 10% increased damage from all sources while frozen.

name: Tempest's Fury
desc: Storm units’ basic attacks have a 15% chance to stun enemies for 1.5 seconds. Abilities unleash a lightning strike, causing KnockBack and applying Decrease Speed by 15% for 3 seconds. Stunned enemies take 10% increased damage from all sources while stunned.

name: Blessing of Purity
desc: Light units’ basic attacks have a 15% chance to Cure themselves and nearby allies, removing all debuffs. Abilities restore 5% health to Light units over 5 seconds (Recovery), and Light units gain +5% MP Recovery when healed.

name: Venomous
desc: Dark units' basic attacks have a 25% chance to poison the target, dealing 5% of their max health as damage over 4 seconds and reducing their healing by 20%. Abilities have a 30% chance to inflict Nightmare, causing enemies to miss their next basic attack and reducing their Attack Speed by 15% for 3 seconds.

name: Whirlwind of Chaos
desc: 2 levels in Accuracy every 10 seconds for 5 seconds, +1 level in Attack

name: Director's Precision
desc: 2 levels in Defense every 10 seconds for 5 seconds, +1 level in Physical Resistance

name: Elderwood's Resilience
desc: 2 levels in MP Recovery every 10 seconds for 5 secondss, +1 level in Accuracy when healed

name: Berserker’s Wrath
desc: 2 levels in Attack Speed every 10 seconds for 5 secondss, +1 level in Attack

name: Fearless Vanguard
desc: 2 levels in Attack every 10 seconds for 5 seconds, +1 level in MP Recovery

name: Illusory Dash
desc: 2 levels in Critical Damage every 10 seconds for 5 seconds, +1 level in Evade

name: Feral Prowess
desc: 2 levels in Physical and Magical Resistance every 10 seconds for 5 seconds, +1 level in Defense

name: Protector’s Oath
desc: 2 levels in Critical Rate every 10 seconds for 5 seconds, +1 level in Critical Damage

name: XP Saver
desc: Gain 25 Gold, Buying XP costs 1 gold less.

name: XP Boost
desc: When you purchase XP, gain an additional 2 XP. Instantly gain 12 XP.

name: Endgame++
desc: When you reach level 9, gain 45 gold & champion duplicatior

name: Fixed Income
desc: You no longer gain interest. Gain 5 gold immediately and receive 4 gold at the start of every pvp round.

name: Loot Drop
desc: Each kill has a 45% chance to drop loots (items, gold, lesser duplicators)

name: Golden Reserve
desc: Max interest to 10 and Gain 20 gold

name: Bounty
desc: Gain 1 Completed Item Box and gain a random items for next4 rounds

name: Special Randomizer
desc: Gain a Special Item component box, and all items on your bench will be randomized at the start of each round.

name: Item Cycle
desc: Gain a completed item box now after 2 completed items each round.

name: Power Growth
desc: a component anvil at Level 4, and a choice of 1 Radiant item at Level 8. and a Remover

name: Level Spins
desc: Gain 5 reroll now and also gain rerolls Equal to the level.

name: Reroll Tactices
desc: Gain 1 free reroll after every shop refresh for the rest of the game

name: Sacrificial Growth
desc: "Purchasing XP costs 6 HP instead of gold, enabling faster leveling at the expense of your health

name: Battle Regen
desc: Gain 2 HP for each round you win, and 3 HP for each round you lose

name: Last Hope
desc: When your tactician is about to be eliminated, they survive with 1 HP instead. After this effect triggers, gain 50 XP and 40 gold at the start of the next round. Additionally, your team gains 25% bonus damage and 10% bonus attack speed for the next two rounds.

name: Mark of Anarchy
desc: Gain a Chaos Emblem and random 2 star champion sharing the same trait

name: Cinematic Masterpiece
desc: Gain a Blockbuster Emblem and random 2 star champion sharing the same trait

name: Elderwood Pact
desc: Gain a Druid Emblem and random 2 star champion sharing the same trait

name: Wrathbound Sigil
desc: Gain a Fury Emblem and random 2 star champion sharing the same trait

name: Queen's Gambit
desc: Gain a Girl Crush Emblem and random 2 star champion sharing the same trait

name: Veil of Illusions
desc: Gain a Mirage Emblem and random 2 star champion sharing the same trait

name: Feral Covenant
desc: Gain a WildRush Emblem and random 2 star champion sharing the same trait

name: Aegis of Eternity
desc: Gain a Guardian Emblem and random 2 star champion sharing the same trait

name: Infernal Devastation
desc: Fire units' basic attacks burn enemies for 8% of the damage dealt over 5 seconds. Abilities cause a massive explosion, dealing 10% of the target's max health as AoE damage to nearby enemies, and burning them foe over 3 seconds. Explosions also reduce the healing received by affected enemies by 25% for 5 seconds.

name: Arctic Dominion
desc: Water units’ basic attacks slow enemies by 35% for 4 seconds. Abilities have a 40% chance to freeze enemies for 2 seconds. Frozen enemies take 15% increased damage .

name: Raging Storm
desc: Storm units’ basic attacks have a 20% chance to stun enemies for 2 seconds. Abilities summon a massive lightning storm that causes KnockBack and applies Decrease Speed by 20% and Decrease Defense by 15% for 4 seconds. Stunned enemies take 15% increased damage.

name: Divine Restoration
desc: Light units’ basic attacks have a 25% chance to Cure all nearby allies within 2 hexes, removing all debuffs. Abilities restore 7% health over 5 seconds (Recovery) to all nearby allies, and if an ally is cured, they also gain +15% MP Recovery for 5 seconds.

name: Toxic Nightmare
desc: Dark units' basic attacks poison the target, dealing 7% of their max health as damage over 5 seconds and reducing their healing by 30%. Abilities have a 40% chance to inflict Nightmare, causing enemies to miss their next basic attack, reducing their Attack Speed by 25% for 4 seconds, and leaving them stunned for 1 second after the Nightmare effect ends.

name: Anarchic Blitz
desc: 3 levels in Accuracy every 10 seconds for 5 seconds, +2 levels in Attack and +1 level in Critical Damage

name: Box Office Smash
desc: 3 levels in Defense every 10 seconds for 5 seconds, +2 levels in Physical Resistance and +1 level in Magic Resistance

name: Ancient Grove's Protection
desc: 3 levels in MP Recovery every 10 seconds for 5 seconds, +2 levels in Accuracy and +1 level in Evade

name: Infernal Onslaught
desc: 3 levels in Attack Speed every 10 seconds for 5 secondss, +2 levels in Attack and +1 level in Critical Damage

name: Queen’s Dominion
desc: 3 levels in Attack every 10 seconds for 5 seconds, +2 levels in MP Recovery and +1 level in Critical Rate and Accuracy

name: Spectral Shift
desc: 3 levels in Critical Damage every 10 seconds for 5 seconds, +2 levels in Evade and +1 level in Physical and Magical Resistance

name: Untamed Frenzy
desc: 3 levels in Physical and Magical Resistance every 10 seconds for 5 seconds, +2 level in Defense, +1 MP Recovery

name: Aegis of Eternity
desc: 3 levels in Critical Rate every 10 seconds for 5 seconds,+2 level in Critical Damage, 1 levels in MP Recovery
